Louise Guthrie (ubochí irí n'ọnwa Ọktoba, 1879 rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị, 1966) bụ ónyé South Africa na-amụ banyere ihe ọkụkụ na ónyé na-ese ihe ọkụkụ.
A mụrụ Isobel Louise Sophie Guthrie na Cape Town, South Africa, na 1879, nwá nwanyị nkè ónyé Bekee a mụrụ na botanist na prọfesọ mgbakọ na mwepụ Francis Guthrie ya na nwunye ya, Isabella Grisbrook
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ụmụ nwanyị nke Rustenburg
Louise Guthrie bụ ónyé enyemaka botanical na Bolus Herbarium, malite na 1918, ruo 1927

Mgbè ọ nọ n'ebe ahụ, ọ zụlitere nkà ya dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe osise botanical, nkè a maara nkè ọma màkà usoro ihe ngosi narị abụọ na iri isii na anọ nke ụdị protea a chọtara na South Africa, nke malitere na 1925, nke ikpeazụ bụ 1947
O nyere ihe nkiri ahụ na Bolus Herbarium na 1948.
A na-eji mbiri nke onye ode akwụkwọ ọkọlọtọ L.Guthrie gosi onye a dị ka odee mgbe ọ na-ehota aha botanical..
Aha osisi guthriae na-asọpụrụ Louise Guthrie.
A na-echekwa nka ya na Mahadum nke Cape Town
Hermanus Botanical Society mèrè ihe ngosi nkè ihe osise irí asaá na isii nke Guthrie na 2000, na Fernkloof Nature Reserve
A na-egosi ụfọdụ n'ime ihe osise mmiri ya na South Africa House na London.
